title.rendered: Influencer Marketing & SEO with Rand Fishkin – Deep-Dive Q&A

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1602775802010{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;background: #1e1e1f url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/AAS_Hero_Chip_R2.jpg?id=202332) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}” el_id=”hero”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525274666229{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Influencer Marketing & SEO with Rand Fishkin

[vc_text_separator title=”Deep-dive Q&A” title_align=”separator_align_left” color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#84c340″ el_class=”speakers-divider” css=”.vc_custom_1597244890286{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1618843555325{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Part of our Agency GROWTH Series

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]As the co-founder and CEO of SparkToro and previous co-founder of Moz and Inbound.org, Rand Fishkin has dedicated his professional life to helping people do better marketing. During this deep-dive Q&A, Rand joins SharpSpring CMO Chip House to discuss influencer marketing, SEO and digital marketing best practices for agencies.

Check out other free sessions like this one via our Agency Growth Series with other top influencers in digital marketing like Seth Godin, Ann Handley, Neil Patel, Shama Hyder and many more![/vc_column_text]

Hosts

Rand Fishkin

CEO, SparkToro

Rand Fishkin is the cofounder and CEO of SparkToro. He’s dedicated his professional life to helping people do better marketing through his blogging, videos, speaking, and his book, Lost and Founder. When Rand’s not working, he’s most likely to be in the company of his partner in marriage and (mostly petty) crime, author Geraldine DeRuiter. If you feed him great pasta or great whiskey, he’ll give you the cheat code to rank #1 on Google.read more...

Chip House

CMO, SharpSpring

Chip House is CMO at SharpSpring. A well-known executive in the email marketing industry, Chip has extensive experience with organizational development and go-to-market strategies in early- to mid-stage B2B SaaS companies. At SharpSpring, Chip drives strategy for the marketing team, leading content, lead generation, marketing operations and more.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1602775957272{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”sticky-mobile-button”][vc_column]
